name: The Guild Origins
description:
Join the Guild as they meet each other for the first time and discover secrets long hidden! 

This is a fangame made for the Guild on NoPixel (GTA RP server). This story is obviously not canon to the Guild; it's just made for fun. This is also a take on how the characters - Not the Larpers - could've possibly met. All speculation, of course.

Hope you have a good time; any feedback is appreciated!

Approximately: 6.333hrs - 9 hrs

CREDITS:

Made Possible by: RPG Maker MV Engine

Inspired By: The Guild & NoPixel

ORIGINAL CHARACTERS:

Yeager Demonblood: Vigor

Bjorn: Biotoxz

Meowfurion Stormkitten: Shiny

Gloryon: Garek

Edwin Leviosa (cameo): GTA Wiseguy

Chauncy Miracles (cameo): Hirona

High Priestess Petunia Brookshire: Nerdandi

High Emperor Lang Buddha/ The Stormlord: Buddha
